Package com.ricoh.camera.sdk.wireless.api.setting.camera

Interfaces, classes and enums to handle camera device settings.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraDeviceSetting
    This class is base class for camera device settings.
    Sub classes of this class are used to handle camera device settings.
    CameraDeviceSetting.Value
    This class is base for value of camera settings.
    CameraTime
    This class for setting of the date and time of camera.
    CameraTime.Value
    This class for setting value of the date and time of camera.
    Channel
    This class for setting of wireless channel.
    Channel.Value
    This class for setting value of wireless channel.
    DeviceInterfaceSetting
    This class is base class for camera device settings about device interface.
    Sub classes of this class are used to handle device interface settings.
    DualCardSlotsMode
    This class for settings of dual card slots mode.
    DualCardSlotsMode.Value
    This class for setting value of dual card slots mode.
    Key
    This class for setting of wireless password.
    Key.Value
    This class for setting value of wireless password.
    SSID
    This class for setting of wireless network name (SSID).
    SSID.Value
    This class for setting value of wireless network name (SSID).
    WLANSetting
    This class is base class for camera device settings about wlan.
    Sub classes of this class are used to handle wlan settings.

Package com.ricoh.camera.sdk.wireless.api.setting.camera Description

Interfaces, classes and enums to handle camera device settings.
